name: Morark's Castle
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys to move

R - Restarts the current room from the way you entered

This was originally created as part of a pitch for a New Zealand game development grant. I built a prototype showcasing the type of game I wanted to create: a puzzle-based exploration game where no reaction-based skill was required to progress.

It's extremely rough, there's no sound and the game ends abruptly, but there are a bunch of puzzles that you can play through and they get pretty difficult towards the end. Worth playing if you're looking for half an hour of janky fun
